Option.Name: Corrected by angle of attacker and victim
Corrected by the angle of the attacker and victim in the horizontal direction only
Corrected by angle of attacker and victim
Corrected by the angle of the attacker and victim in the horizontal direction only

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

hitStopTime.Wiki: Hard hit (FDP hit stop) stop time [s]

spEffectId0.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied by this attack.

spEffectId1.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied by this attack.

spEffectId2.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied by this attack.

spEffectId3.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied by this attack.

spEffectId4.Wiki: SpEffect ID applied by this attack.

hit0_DmyPoly1.Wiki: Dummy Polygon in sphere, capsule position

hit1_DmyPoly1.Wiki: Dummy Polygon in sphere, capsule position

hit2_DmyPoly1.Wiki: Dummy Polygon in sphere, capsule position

hit3_DmyPoly1.Wiki: Dummy Polygon in sphere, capsule position

hit0_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Dummy Polygon. -1 makes it a sphere

hit1_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Dummy Polygon. -1 makes it a sphere

hit2_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Dummy Polygon. -1 makes it a sphere

hit3_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Dummy Polygon. -1 makes it a sphere

blowingCorrection.Wiki: Multiplier to the base blow-off power

atkPhysCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base Kinetic attack power

atkMagCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base Energy attack power

atkFireCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base Explosive attack power

atkThunCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base Coral attack power

atkStamCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base stamina attack power

guardAtkRateCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base guard attack power

guardBreakCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base guard defense power

atkThrowEscapeCorrection.Wiki: Multiplier to the base throw attack power

atkSuperArmorCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base poise attack power

atkPhys.Wiki: The base Kinetic attack power. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

atkMag.Wiki: The base Energy attack power. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

atkFire.Wiki: The base Explosive attack power. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

atkThun.Wiki: The base Coral attack power. Used primarily for NPC attacks.

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Multiplier to the reduction of stamina damage when guarding.

guardRate.Wiki: NPC, the guard performance set in the weapon parameter is uniformly corrected. 0, 1x / 100, 2x / -100, guard multiplier = (guard multiplier / 100) to increase / decrease the parameter to 0. + 1)

throwTypeId.Wiki: ID associated with the throw parameter

hit0_Priority.Wiki: Hit priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hit1_Priority.Wiki: Hit priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hit2_Priority.Wiki: Hit priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hit3_Priority.Wiki: Hit priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

dmgLevel.Wiki: Which damage animation should be played against the enemy when attacking?

mapHitType.Wiki: Which map do you see around the attack? The set

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Guard cut rate invalidation ratio (-100 to 100) Normal at 0 / Completely invalidated at -100 / Doubles the defense effect of the opponent at 100 -50, 100% cut shield becomes 50% cut Become

atkAttribute.Wiki: Live bullet attribute to set for attack

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to set for attacks

atkType.Wiki: Specify particles and sounds at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size)

atkMaterial.Wiki: Specify particles and sounds at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size)

atkSize.Wiki: Specify particles and sounds at the time of attack (Although it is reserved, it is used, so be sure to set it blank or small)

hitSourceType.Wiki: The source of the Dummy Polygon ID for the attack?

disableGuard.Wiki: If 1, ignore the guard on the guard side and enter the damage level

disableStaminaAttack.Wiki: The stamina attack power is used to determine if it is broken, but the stamina is not actually reduced.

IgnoreNotifyMissSwingForAI.AltName: Disable Missed Attack Notification For AI
IgnoreNotifyMissSwingForAI.Wiki: Do not notify AI of missed swing

repeatHitSfx.Wiki: Enemy only: Does SFX occur continuously when hitting a wall?

isDisableNoDamage.Wiki: Ignore invincible effects such as steps, TAE's complete invincibility cannot be ignored.

hideHitFe.Wiki: When hit, FE will not display Hit or Guard, so only special effects will be applied.

isDisableDmgLvReplaceAddLv.AltName: Disable Addition Replacement during Continuous Damage
isDisableDmgLvReplaceAddLv.Wiki: Do you want to disable the function that replaces the damage with additional damage when receiving continuous damage?

isDamageReactionCancelInertia.AltName: Is Inertia removed by Damage Reaction
isDamageReactionCancelInertia.Wiki: Can you eliminate inertia with damage reactions?

isCheckDoorPenetration.Wiki: Whether to perform occlusion checks. If it is ○, it will be determined whether it is possible to attack the target through the shield.

atkBehaviorId.Wiki: Behavior identification value: Causes a specific enemy to have a special reaction when hit by a specific attack.

rigidImpulse.Wiki: Impulse applied to the rigid body hit by the attack

AppearAiSoundId.Wiki: ID of AI sound generated when an attack occurs

HitAiSoundId.Wiki: ID of AI sound generated at the time of hit

HitRumbleId.Wiki: Vibration ID on hit (-1 disabled). This is the vibration ID when none of the following three apply.

HitRumbleIdByNormal.AltName: Vibration on Hit: Dummy Polygon Tip
HitRumbleIdByNormal.Wiki: Hit vibration ID when hitting the tip of the dummy polygon (-1 disabled)

HitRumbleIdByMiddle.AltName: Vibration on Hit: Dummy Polygon Center
HitRumbleIdByMiddle.Wiki: Hit vibration ID when hitting the center of the dummy polygon (-1 disabled)

HitRumbleIdByRoot.AltName: Vibration on Hit: Dummy Polygon Root
HitRumbleIdByRoot.Wiki: Hit vibration ID when hitting the root of the dummy polygon (-1 disabled)

traceSfxId0.Wiki: Particle to display for the attack trail (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdHead0.Wiki: The dummy polygon that points to the root of the attack trail capsule (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail0.Wiki: The dummy polygon that points to the tip of the attack trail capsule (-1 invalid)

bEnableSaBreak.Wiki: Is it possible to break poise?

assetBreakActionType.Wiki: TAE action type played when an asset is destroyed by this attack

cameraRumbleID.Wiki: ID of camera vibration upon hit

cameraRumbleDefenseID.Wiki: ID of camera vibration upon guarded hit

dmgHitRecordLifeTime.Wiki: The interval at which damage is taken. It only hits once at 0.0f or less.

knockbackAtkSpdScaleMinSpeedKmh.AltName: Knockback: Attacker Speed Correction - Minimum Speed
knockbackAtkSpdScaleMinSpeedKmh.Wiki: Minimum speed to determine the magnification that increases the speed of the person attacking with knockback. In kilometres per hour.

knockbackAtkSpdScaleMaxSpeedKmh.AltName: Knockback: Attacker Speed Correction - Maximum Speed
knockbackAtkSpdScaleMaxSpeedKmh.Wiki: Maximum speed to determine the magnification that increases the speed of the person attacking with knockback. In kilometres per hour.

knockbackAtkSpdScaleMinScale.AltName: Knockback: Attacker Speed Correction - Minimum Speed Multiplier
knockbackAtkSpdScaleMinScale.Wiki: Multiplier to increase the speed of the person attacking with knockback (this multiplier when the speed is below the minimum speed)

knockbackAtkSpdScaleMaxScale.AltName: Knockback: Attacker Speed Correction - Maximum Speed Multiplier
knockbackAtkSpdScaleMaxScale.Wiki: Multiplier to increase the speed of the person attacking with knockback (this multiplier when the speed is below the maximum speed)

shooterKnockbackMPS.Wiki: Recoil (knockback) speed received when shooting. In metres per second.

deadAnimType.Wiki: Determines the opponent's animation when the opponent dies from this attack.

cameraRumbleMapID.AltName: Camera Vibration ID on Map Collision
cameraRumbleMapID.Wiki: ID of camera vibration when hitting the map

cameraRumbleMapEnableDistance.Wiki: Distance at which camera vibration is effective when hitting the map. In metres.

shooterKnockbackDirType.Wiki: Direction that serves as a basis for calculating recoil knockback

dmgLevel_Friendly.Wiki: Damage level when hit by an ally including yourself

atkDarkCorrection.Wiki: Player only. Multiplier to the base Dark attack power

grabEnableDmgLevel.Wiki: You can grab it if it is above this damage level.

guardJudgeType.Wiki: Attack position type used when determining guard/barrier

hit0_Length.Wiki: Starting length of the hit capsule, in metres.

hit0_MaxLength.Wiki: Maxmimum length of the hit capsule, in metres.

hit0_LengthExpandTime.Wiki: Stretch the length in the direction of secondary dummy poly for this amount of time. In seconds.

hit0_MaxRadius.Wiki: Maxmimum radius of the hit capsule, in metres.

hit0_ThicknessExpandTime.Wiki: The thickness of the area increases linearly from the radius to the maximum radius over this time.

hit0_KeepInitTime.Wiki: Change the shape of the area after this amount of time has passed. In seconds.

hit0_SfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID used by this hit capsule.

hit0_SfxDeleteType.Wiki: The deletion type for the SFX used by this hit capsule.

hit0_hitCreateType.Wiki: The creation type used by this hit capsule.

isHitFpsBarrier.Wiki: Will it hit the FPS barrier?

isHit0_ExpandPenetrateChr.Wiki: Will it penetrate the character when expanding or contracting?

isHit0_ExpandPenetrateMap.Wiki: Will it pass through map hits when expanding or contracting?

isHit0_ExpandSfxHitPos.AltName: Hit 0: Place Particle on Hit Location
isHit0_ExpandSfxHitPos.Wiki: Should the SFX during expansion and contraction be based on the hit location?

isUseknockbackBladeAddDmg.AltName: Use Additional Knockback Power for Blade
isUseknockbackBladeAddDmg.Wiki: Should the additional damage knockback power for the blade be used

isHitSfxPosCorrection.AltName: Correct Hit Particle Position of Melee Weapon
isHitSfxPosCorrection.Wiki: Should the hit SFX generation position be corrected to the position between the lock dummy polys?

isUseHitSfxHitVel.AltName: Correct Hit Particle Direction to Bullet Direction
isUseHitSfxHitVel.Wiki: Should the hit SFX be issued according to the direction of bullet flight?

isAtkTotalWeightCorrectionRate_forPc.AltName: Is Attack Power based on Total Weight (Player Only)
isAtkTotalWeightCorrectionRate_forPc.Wiki: If 1, refer to the correction calculation graph parameter 'Total weight correction coefficient: attack power multiplier'

isChrAttachGeomSkip.Wiki: As a performance measure, do you want to avoid hitting assets attached to characters when expanding or contracting?

isInsFirstHitCheckOnly.Wiki: To improve performance, avoid checking multiple hits on the same character or asset, and be careful as the SFX generation position may shift (multiple hits are excluded after they hit, but this is excluded before they hit)

isFSDP.Wiki: Is it FSDP (clog occurs when packet loss occurs instead of guaranteeing delivery)

isDisableSpEffectNoDead.Wiki: Ignore immortality special effects such as emergency PA

isMultiHitDisableMap.Wiki: Exclude the map with multiple hits?

isDefMaterialIgnore.Wiki: Do you want to disable the SFX defense material change on the impact side?

isDisableBulletGeneration.Wiki: Should multi-hit information be shared while ignoring generations when the attack ID is the same?

combatIncreasePoint.Wiki: The amount of engagement level that increases each time you are hit. Linked to AI detection

shootSeCategory.Wiki: ID for identifying SE to be played by association with attack material and attack strength

id_forSe.Wiki: Identification ID for determining the SE to play

se_reflectLv.Wiki: The level of reverb for the sound

dmgCalcSide.Wiki: Damage Judgment Side: Which side decides the hit judgment of the attack?
